Colossal 4–{5}{U}{U}{U} [i](You may cast this for its colossal cost to have it enter with four +1/+1 counters; or pay {5}{U}{U}{U} as a sorcery: Put four +1/+1 counters on it if it has none.)[/i]
Whenever Megalokraken enters the battlefield or attacks, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is Megalokraken’s power. You may cast a noncreature spell from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
